meaningMnemonic: A <radical>rice paddy</radical> that's like a <radical>thread</radical> is extremely <kanji>thin</kanji>, but also <kanji>detailed</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>thin</kanji> rice paddy is for your <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい). You only gave your cyborg a really thin strip of human stomach, so it only needs a thin line of rice to eat.
